channel.title: Acting Out OK – News
channel.description: Spotlights on actors, productions, and what's happening in the Oklahoma film community.

item.title: Hollywood on the Prairie: Tulsa Launches First-Ever Film Incentive
item.description: Tulsa's new film incentive launched February 1, 2026—and it's stackable with state rebates. Here's why that's a big deal for actors in the 918.

item.title: MovieMaker Rankings: OKC and Tulsa Top the List
item.description: Both cities landed on MovieMaker Magazine's 2026 Top 25 Places to Live and Work as a Moviemaker—Tulsa at #18, OKC at #24 in the big cities category. Here's what that means for local talent.
